title: Latvian President Edgars Rinkēvičs' Independence Day speech
summary_full: This is an unofficial translation of speech delivered by President Edgars Rinkēvičs at the Freedom Monument in central Rīga on the evening of November 18th, 2025.
summary_public: This is an unofficial translation of speech delivered by President Edgars Rinkēvičs at the Freedom Monument in central Rīga on the evening of November 18th, 2025.
